NPC.name: Lixi Worker
NPC.description: six and a half feet tall this girl is clad from head to toe in white chitinous exoskeletal plates. This makes her look like she's wearing a form of natural and shapely full plate armour. Her head is adorned with a long pair of antenna and her back with long insectile wings that flick about now and then. Finally looking further down her ass is adorned with a long and clearly flexible insectile tail like a segmented dragonfly tail of sorts extending longer than her body.
